MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL41 postcode area of Blaenau Ffestiniog, affecting properties in Ffestiniog and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations into the cause of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:30AM on 18th February 2021
